name: SD Gundam G Generation: Mono-Eye Gundams
overview: The final Wonderswan entry in the G Generation franchise. As opposed to the console games, Monoeye Gundams features an original crossover plot. The game begins at the end of the One Year War, when the main character Sig Wedner is a pilot in the Zeon army. Sig fights the One Year War with his comrades, including Sera Iskperi and Ein Levy, but at the end of the One Year War, Ein suddenly betrays Sig, which results in Sig being seriously injured and Sera being reduced to ashes. Seven years later, Sig has become a soldier for Aegon and is fighting the Titans under Char. The fate of a woman who appears to be dead (Sera), is about to bring them together again...
